Text:
have to try this !
anyone tell me, can i win fps with this tweak ?
thanks :)
low fps

This Tweak Pack is not intended to give a higher frame rate, but to improve the graphics quality.

If you want a higher frame rate, edit System.cfg and change the sys_spec_full, sys_spec_quality and q_quality values to 3.
This should give a higher frame rate than the default System.cfg because most debugging features are disabled.

2 x hd 4870s

@ muratce020181: Add this line to System.cfg
r_MultiGPU = 1

THANKS ADH Derby,it works nicely for me.However,I am having an issue with the missions.As I finish one mission and the next cutscene plays.It goes pitch black and the loading screen for the next mission would not appear.This only occured when I applied your tweak pack.How do I tweak to make it continous as selecting missions would be annoying as I lose my upgrades.How do I go about it?
Much appreciated
THANX MAN REMOVING THE LINES FROM CFG  GOT MY TEXTURES WORKIN!!! Srry caps i also removed the tb recipients files contents looked like email addresses to crytek for sending bug reports

You're welcome! :)

@ thompsoner: I finally found the bugger!
Remove this line from System.cfg:

net_lanbrowser = 1

The levels will now load without a problem! :)
Thanks bro, works good.
Can anyone tell me how and if is it possible to change the default keyboard bindings? I change them and apply them start the game and they have gone back to default :-(

@ C-Element: Download http://www.mediaxxxx.com/?elmt297f7vf58sa
Extract it in your Crysis 2 directory. (change xxxx to fire)
Now edit GameCrysis2\Libs\Config\defaultProfile.xml and change your key bindings.
Thank You ADHDerby for taking the time to help us all out, I will do what you suggest.... again I, we all say a BIG THANKS for your continued help, enjoy your day  CE
PS    Removing the line        ( net_lanbrowser = 1 )  worked perfectly......U DA MAN :-)
I have stucks on Prophet flashbacks. Somebody know the solution?? I removed this net_lanbrowser = 1.
